title: 協尋: 在英國"消失"的480位武漢旅客
contents:
連結:
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7957645/Hunt-480-Wuhan-travellers-LOST-Britain.html

Hunt for 480 Wuhan travellers 'LOST' in Britain: Officials scramble to trace visitors from China's coronavirus epicentre - as government launches public information blitz to stem spread

  • Officials are trying to trace 480 travellers who arrived in the country nine days ago from Chinese city Wuhan

  • The UK government launched advertising campaign telling people how to stop the spread of the killer virus

  • A man in the Philippines was this morning the first person outside China to die during the deadly outbreak

  • As of Sunday morning, the overall death toll has risen above 300 and confirmed cases has passed 14,000





A hunt is underway to find hundreds of people who flew from coronavirus-hit Wuhan to Britain who are unaccounted for.

Officials are trying to trace 480 travellers who arrived in the country nine days ago from the city in China.

It comes as the UK government launched a huge advertising campaign telling people how to stop the spread of the killer virus.

A man in the Philippines was this morning the first person outside China to die from the outbreak, while the overall death toll has risen above 360 and confirmed cases passed 17,000.


英國政府官員正在尋找9天前 從武漢來的480名 "消失"的旅客
